bibl.title: Alfonso Gagliardi v. T.W. Lynch. Assignment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: The undersigned, Angelo Marra, the surety on the bonds of Alfonso Gagliardi and Tony Marra, Immigration cases pending before the Commissioner of Immigration at Seattle, Washington, and who has heretofore deposited with the Commissioner of Immigration at Seattle, Washington, United States Bonds in the sum of $500.00 in each case, as surety, for the delivery of each of the persons last named, and who is now entitled to receive the delivery of said bonds in the total sum of $1,000.00 from the Commissioner of Immigration, which said delivery is through no fault of the undersigned delayed;

NOW THEREFORE, the undersigned does hereby assign to the Clerk of the United States District Court in and for the Western District of Washington the said bonds now held by the Commissioner of Immigration in the sum of $1,000.00 and consent that the same may be deposited with the Clerk of said Court as surety for the appearance of the said Alfonso Gagliardi in the above entitled matter in accordance with the terms of a bond this day filed in the above entitled matter.
Dated at Seattle, Washington this 23rd day of December, 1921.

THIS IS TO CERTIFY, That on this 23rd day of December, A.D. 1921, before me, a Notary Public in and for the State of Washington, duly commissioned and sworn, personally came, ANGELO MARRA, to me known to be the individual described in and who executed the within instrument, and acknowledged to me that he signed and sealed the same as his free and voluntary act and deed for the uses and purposes therein mentioned.
WITNESS my hand and official seal, the day and year in this certificate first above written.
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington residing at Seattle
In the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
Filed in the United States District Court
